name: SunCulture
description:
SunCulture designs, manufactures, finances, and services Africa's market-leading IoT-enabled solar energy systems and irrigation equipment, as well as other productive agricultural goods and services.

SunCulture's vision is to build a world where people take control of their environment in rewarding, sustainable ways. We do this by developing and commercializing life-changing technology that solves the biggest daily challenges for the world’s 570m smallholder farming households.
slogan: Scaling climate solutions to unlock and accelerate the untapped promise of African agriculture
